short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize the information around your tour, like your schedule, notes, and bookmarks, into one efficient dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can login to your Tour platform account (usetour.com),  write relevant notes and bookmark top links about your property, and share those notes with other team members, as well run quick timers to help plan and schedule your work day.
